mapper.sql: select id, created_by, created_time, updated_by, updated_time, goods_num, order_no, user_id, bui_id, goods_type, order_status, pay_type, order_amount, end_time, pay_time, collection_name from cnt_order
mapper.select: select co.id, co.user_bui_id userBuiId, co.order_no orderno, cu.nick_name nickname, cu.phone, co.bui_id buiId, co.collection_name collectionname, co.goods_type goodstype, co.goods_num goodsnum, co.order_status orderstatus, co.pay_type paytype, co.order_amount orderamount, co.pay_time paytime, co.created_time createdtime, co.updated_time updatedtime from cnt_order co inner join cnt_user cu on co.user_id = cu.id where co.user_id=#{userid} order by co.created_time desc

select a.date, ifnull( b.count, 0 ) as count from ( select date_sub( curdate(), interval 6 day ) as date union all select date_sub( curdate(), interval 5 day ) as date union all select date_sub( curdate(), interval 4 day ) as date union all select date_sub( curdate(), interval 3 day ) as date union all select date_sub( curdate(), interval 2 day ) as date union all select date_sub( curdate(), interval 1 day ) as date union all select curdate() as date ) a left join ( select date( created_time ) as datetime, count( id ) as count from cnt_order where order_status=1 group by date( created_time ) ) b on a.date = b.datetime;

select a.date, ifnull( b.orderAmounts, 0.00) as orderAmounts from ( select date_sub( curdate(), interval 6 day ) as date union all select date_sub( curdate(), interval 5 day ) as date union all select date_sub( curdate(), interval 4 day ) as date union all select date_sub( curdate(), interval 3 day ) as date union all select date_sub( curdate(), interval 2 day ) as date union all select date_sub( curdate(), interval 1 day ) as date union all select curdate() as date ) a left join ( select date( created_time ) as datetime, sum(order_amount) as orderAmounts from cnt_order where order_status=1 group by date( created_time ) ) b on a.date = b.datetime;
select order_status as orderstatus, count( order_status ) as totaltypepercentages from cnt_order group by order_status;
